fields.name: Screenshot
fields.desc: Any screenshot of Inkscape, it's tools or extensions.

fields.name: UI Mockup
fields.desc: An example or plan of how the user interface should look.

fields.name: Tutorial Video
fields.desc: A link to a video service where it shows what is possible with inkscape.

fields.name: Inkscape Extension
fields.desc: A python package or link to a pypi installable package which contains an extension for inkscape.

fields.name: Inkscape Pallet
fields.desc: An inkscape Colour Pallet containing useful and related colours.

fields.name: Inkscape Symbols
fields.desc: An svg file containing multiple related symbols or useful components for use in the symbols dialog. i.e. a Stencil.

fields.name: Inkscape Package
fields.desc: A binary or source package of Inkscape for any platform.
